sentences.sContent: a proud man who would not admit his mistakes
sentences.sCn: 自以为是、不愿认错的男子

words.tran: 傲慢地，自负地；得意洋洋地

remMethod.val: 骄傲的(proud)孔雀态度非常傲慢(pride)

trans.tranCn: 感到自豪的；感到骄傲的
trans.tranOther: thinking that you are more important, skilful etc than you really are – used to show disapproval
